name: cfjava
description: Provides support for writing Java code within ColdFusion.

params.name: handle
params.description: The variable that holds the value of class instance of the Java code.

examples.title: Create Name instance (Tag syntax)
examples.code:
<cfjava handle="nameInstance">
    public class Name {
        private String firstName;
        private String lastName;

        public Name(String firstName, String lastName) {
            this.firstName = firstName;
            this.lastName = lastName;
        }

        public String getFullName() {
            return firstName + " " + lastName;
        }
    }
</cfjava>
<cfset nameInstance.init("John", "Doe")>
<cfset fullName = nameInstance.getFullName()>
<cfoutput>#fullName#</cfoutput>
